Economically, it would be HUGE. You could do a three way tax on it. Distributer, seller, and buyer. It has numerous health benefits. WRITING.TITLE: I had the weirdest thought last night..
WRITING.TEXT:
So I was with a couple friends last night, and, after a couple bowls, we settled in to watch a movie. I was probably at a solid 8, higher than I've been in a while. About 20 minutes into the movie, I decided I wanted to cuddle with my friend laying on the floor. Even though I hate being the big spoon, it was the most readily open position. So I snuggled up to him, and immediately the thought came into my head that I was just like a baby koala on it's mama's back. Even at the time, I knew that was fucking weird. But still, I couldn't shake the thought and feeling that we were just like two little koalas.
And that's how I drifted off to sleep, imagining and feeling like I was a baby koala. It was weird. But somehow, I still woke up feeling more rested than I have in weeks. huh.
Peace and love homies.
